item.content:encoded: Thanks Dearic! 80G seems to be a lot! I will go ask my interested guilddies …

item.title: By: Dearic
item.dc:creator: Dearic
item.description:
<blockquote>However for some reason I can only do practice 2v2, 3v3 and 5v5 arenas, can't do the real one. Anyone knows the reason?</blockquote>
I'm assuming you're level 70.
You can do practice arenas at any time, but to do the real ones, you need to register a (semi)permanent team first, and have all of the members sign the team charter. I'm guessing you haven't done this yet.
Team charters cost 80 gold (more for bigger teams), and can be purchased from Arena Organizers at the three arenas. (Gadgetzan, Nagrand and Blades Edge)
item.content:encoded:
However for some reason I can only do practice 2v2, 3v3 and 5v5 arenas, can’t do the real one. Anyone knows the reason?

I’m assuming you’re level 70.

You can do practice arenas at any time, but to do the real ones, you need to register a (semi)permanent team first, and have all of the members sign the team charter. I’m guessing you haven’t done this yet.

Team charters cost 80 gold (more for bigger teams), and can be purchased from Arena Organizers at the three arenas. (Gadgetzan, Nagrand and Blades Edge)
